backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the backend for a gaming/betting app, including user registration, game recording, deposit requests, access control, blob storage, and invite links modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two implemented features (setting the app title and updating branding to 'YONO DAN') to their relevant files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of key frontend source files, describing their purpose and notable changes such as the 'YONO DAN' branding update.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file importing Tailwind directives and defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app with the page title set to 'YONO DAN' and a root div mounting the main.tsx module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, page routing, user profile fetching, and a 5-second loading timeout guard to prevent indefinite loading spinners.
frontend/src/components/Banner.tsx: Auto-rotating promotional banner component cycling through three slides (welcome bonus, deposit offer, withdrawal info) every 3 seconds with fade/slide animation.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with five tabs (Home, Activity, Refer, Support, Account) that highlights the active page and calls navigateTo on click.
frontend/src/components/GameGrid.tsx: Game grid component displaying six games split into Multiplayer and Skill & Strategy sections as cards with images, badges, player counts, and Play Now buttons that navigate to the game page.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header component showing the user's avatar, VIP level, name, wallet balance with a shimmer animation, and an Add Cash button that navigates to the payment page.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps page content with a bottom navigation bar, hiding the nav on 'payment' and 'game' pages.
frontend/src/components/LoginSignup.tsx: Multi-step login/signup flow using Internet Identity, mobile OTP verification, and optional user registration with referral code support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor, reinitializing it when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, exposing login/logout state and identity via a React context hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS defining Tailwind base styles, custom CSS variables for a dark navy/gold theme, utility classes, and keyframe animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Account.tsx: User account page displaying profile info, wallet balance, win/loss stats, and game history with a logout option.
frontend/src/pages/Activity.tsx: Daily check-in page that tracks login streaks and lets users claim escalating daily bonus rewards stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/GamePlay.tsx: Renders a game play page for six mini-games (Dragon vs Tiger, 7 Up Down, Andar Bahar, Ludo, Mines, Crash) with bet selection, client-side game logic, and balance updates via the actor hook.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page component that composes the Header, Banner, and GameGrid components along with a footer attribution link.
frontend/src/pages/Payment.tsx: Deposit/add-cash page where users select an amount, enter a 12-digit UTR number after paying via PhonePe UPI, and submit a deposit request to the backend actor.
frontend/src/pages/ReferEarn.tsx: Refer & Earn page that displays the user's referral code, provides copy/share actions, and explains the referral reward flow.
frontend/src/pages/Support.tsx: Support page with quick-topic chips and a subject/message form that simulates submission, plus contact info showing a UPI support number and response time.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback for persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, defining dark mode, custom fonts (Rajdhani, Orbitron), and an extended color palette using oklch values including gold, navy, chart, and sidebar color sets.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state for 'YONO DAN', recording existing features for setting the app title and updating branding, with schema version and clarification settings.
